settings

Summary
A single record with global settings. This provides a simple, typesafe way to store some global settings in the database. For example, we could define a global contact (email or phone) for technical assistance with the portal.


Fields
Name Type Attributes Description
auditLogTitle  calculated
max length: 1000
allows all 		abstract
  		This is used a the title in auditLogs. This should NEVER be null.  
code  integer primary key
required
  		The unique key; hardcoded to 1.  
domainSubtitle  calculated
max length: 1000
allows all 		abstract
  		The subtitle commonly used for rows in a list. This MAY be null, if there is not subtitle.  
domainTitle  calculated
max length: 1000
allows all 		abstract
  		The title commonly used for rows in a list or dropdown field. This should NEVER be null.  
lockVersion  lockVersion required
audit disabled   		This is used to coordinate optimistic locking in the database. This is usually not displayed.  
someMessage  text100
max length: 100
allows printable 		  Just a placeholder until more useful settings are defined.
